column2: "Oh, hey partner! This place is really amazing! This is where the Dragonkin live right?"
"The scale is huge, but more than that I'm amazed the Dragonkin are communicating now!"
"I wonder who it was that finally got through to them? They have a lot of balls!"
"But I really have to admire people who have a crazy idea and see it through to the end!"
"Makes me want to do something amazing too... Eventually..."
"I'm going to get going, see you, partner!"
